channel.title: Item price help
channel.description:
When im changing price in the item.cfg, compiles and running the server those errors comes up Quote:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)
And when i connected with the client nothing comes up it is a black screen but the chat box and the menu box is still there. The whole client laggs. Anyone know what i shall do?

item.title: Item price help
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:3, topic:323567”]Look back to your item.cfg to the items you changed. Make sure you use press the TAB key, rather than pressing space multiple times.[/quote] Also make sure you didnt put a “,” Comma inbetween numbers like for example, 99,000, Dont put a comma inbetween. 99000

Read full topic

item.title: Item price help
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Look back to your item.cfg to the items you changed. Make sure you use press the TAB key, rather than pressing space multiple times.
